Sinitta added that Simon Cowell had only recently accepted the fact that he wouldn't be able to judge both shows. People have said he'll fly backwards and forwards and do both. But he's not just a judge, he's also a mentor. That means he needs to stay in just one place. It's possible Simon Cowell will miss the UK version for a year and come back once the US one is settled in. Steve Jones is in the running to land the presenting gig on the US show ahead of Dermot O'Leary , who has made no secret of his desire to move Stateside.

Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
